answers.answer: My feet and hands were swollen from 25w on with my first. With my daughter my hands started getting swollen at 30ish weeks. It was uncomfortable but I just tried keeping my feet up and couldn't wear my rings anymore.

Swelling can be a normal pregnancy symptom, but it can also be a symptom of preeclampsia(idk if I spelled that correctly lol) especially if it's accompanied with high blood pressure. I would drink alot of water and keep your legs elevated. If not better soon call your ob.
drinking a lot of water helps with swelling. i'm 35+1 & i haven't had swelling at all. i'm always drinking water though.

question: Are.my feet and fingers suppose.to be swollen? Its very uncomfortable,  Im 33 weeks
title: question
